item.description:
The park is on the south shore. Kate knows the park well and will lead a hike for about 2 hours. Please expect that the pace will be moderate to fast, depending on your level of fitness. Below are directions and a link to the DCR website. Please bring plenty of water and snacks for you and your pets.

As always, all dogs are welcomed, but please be sure you have them under control.



Directions
To get there, leave route 3 at exit 14 in Norwell and head north towards Hingham. Go for about 3 miles and turn right on Free Street. Follow Free Street to Union Street at the Park's entrance.

http://www.mass.gov/d...
item.how_to_find_us: Kate drives a blue Jeep Cherokee
item.name: Womputuck State Park
